name: Anomaly home icon(for tumblr)
description: As promised, your very own anomaly for tumblr! Just don't go about ending the world, yeah?

user.name: frodoismyenergydrink
user.about:
I don't know how to create styles, and I don't know how to do code, but I will try my best when my fandoms are in need!
Also, I don't understand the Creative Commons License(like, okay, I understand that's it's all legal stuff, but I don't want to figure out which one I need) basically, do whatever you want. I don't care. you don't have to credit me. Simply, enjoy.

additional_info:
Whoo! Couldn't sleep, so, here you go! I know this is cooler than the ARC logo, that was sort of the point.
And, I promise that this man(er, woman, actually) made anomaly won't destroy anything.
Also, yes, it does go a bit lower than most icons would, and I was going to fix that, but it's an anomaly, I thought it was fitting.
EDIT: I fixed the weird repeating pattern that was on the bottom! I guess I just didn't really notice it for a while. Whoops!
